commit.message:
re PR c++/65656 (__builtin_constant_p should always be constexpr)

	PR c++/65656
	* constexpr.c (cxx_eval_builtin_function_call): Fix
	__builtin_constant_p.

From-SVN: r222531

files.patch:
@@ -1,5 +1,9 @@

+	PR c++/65656

+	__builtin_constant_p.
+

 	(strip_typedefs_expr): Likewise.
